@comment package: autogenerated by the compile.js script in NonStandard
name: com.codegiraffe.nonstandard.unityutility
description:
NonStandard library imported using NonStandard package management

* Delayed: allows actions to execute on a timer, of frames or seconds
* Follow: makes one transform follow another
* LeavParent: automatically disconnect a transform from it's parent on start
* NextScene: change the scene on DoActivateTrigger
* OnActiveChange: execute functions when script is Enabled or Disabled.
